description:
Rin finds out that Hayato and Ui are living together! Infuriated and shocked, she has to snoop around for evidence of foul play...and get in their way as much as possible.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaichou to Fuuki Iinchou no Yuzurenai Tatakai
The Unrelenting Battle of the President and the Disciplinary Committee Head
会長と風紀委員長の譲れない戦い
